text:
Luka Đorđević (Cyrillic: Лукa Ђорђевић; born 9 July 1994) is a Montenegrin professional association football player. He is currently on loan with FC Arsenal Tula.
Career.
He played for FK Mogren in the 2011/2012 season. He played 24 league matches with the club, and made one appearance in a UEFA Champions League qualification match against PFC Litex Lovech.
He made his first appearance with Zenit St. Petersburg on 11 August 2012 against Spartak Moscow.
On 22 July 2017, he was loaned to FC Arsenal Tula.
He played his first international match for Montenegro on 27 August 2012 against San Marino. He also scored his first international goal in that match.
